Reference

Genetic code

Tools for genetic in different translation tables

aminoacid() gen_code()

Tools for the genetic code

Random generation

Tools for random generation of nucleotide sequences

rand_nuc_seq()

Generate random nucleotide sequences

rand_acg()

Generate random codons with A, C, and G only

Translation

Tools for RNA translation to a protein chain

translate()

Translate a RNA sequence to a protein sequence

antiparallel()

Find the antiparallel sequence

dna_to_rna() rna_to_dna()

Tools for transcription DNA to RNA

Helpers

Helper functions

highlight_pattern()

Highlight a pattern sequence in a vector

nth_element()

Extract the nth element of a numeric or character sequence

separate_col()

Separate a character column into multiple columns with a regular expression

split_each()

Split a character sequence systematically each n pieces

tidy_sequence()

Tidy up a character vector

is_dna() is_rna()

Check if a sequence is DNA or RNA
